title: 1.9 Sword Cooldown

replies.body:
Keep in mind that it's only in a snapshot.
It's still under development and is still being tested.

replies.body: Yep! That's why it's important we give Mojang our opinions now, while they're in the process of making these new changes. That's the whole reason they make snapshots publicly available :D
